name: ChristmasTreeChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open christmas tree game”
”Alexa, start christmas tree game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas tree challenge
des: This game requires at least 2 Echo Buttons, but the more the merrier! Two to four contestants will battle each other to become top star of the Christmas Tree! Alexa will ask three questions about the objects on the Christmas tree. Players will have 30 seconds to find the answer, race back to their Echo buttons, and buzz in with their answer. If you're right, you get a point. Alexa will let you know if you're right or wrong and track your score. The player with the most correct answers wins! If there's a tie, you can celebrate your joint victory with Christmas cheer!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
